Name: EFH
AboutMe:
I just noticed that the one profile copies to each site. I will have to start adding reference to each of the StackExchange sites to seem a bit more multidimensional.

superuser: I got an Apple IIe at about 10 years of age. I became a computer gamer. Then you needed to know how to wiggle, jiggle, manipulate, and navigate all around a computer (at least software side) to get it to do what you wanted. I was motivated to learn and worked long and hard at it. Now, like many of you I am sure, I am the the go-to guy when it comes to fixing, tweaking, or simply using the potential of friends and neighbors computers.

Role-Playing Games: GMed on and off over the years. Mostly off for the past 10 years or so. Starting things back up. Have started to formalize my last campaign in a wiki and am resurrecting it as I type! Thus I am here to seek the insight and experiences of others.

wiki.enclaverpg.org is my campaign site forum.enclaverpg.org is my attempt at moving some of the play and day to day routines onto the web
